title: Community of Practice
description: An initiative to foster collaboration and researcher-driven guidance in advancing Open Science and FAIR principles in SciLifeLab services and projects.

title: FAIR Metadata and Semantic Technologies
description: An initiative to promote metadata, semantic technologies and the FAIR principles, enhancing data interoperability to further support life sciences research.

title: Open Science Monitoring
description: An initiative for implementing an open science monitoring solution to better understand and promote open science practices within our community

title: AI Network
description: An initiative to provide an AI community for SciLifeLab researchers and infrastructure users by encouraging collaboration and the sharing of emerging technologies.
